price: 16. Farmoytit keenik itteh; “diggah nanu sin fanah rubsumte farmoytit kinninom diggah Ni-Rabbi yaaxigeh”.
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbunā yaʿlamu innā ilaykum lamur'salūna
